Album: Beware (feat. Lil Wayne & Jhene Aiko) - Single
Lyric:
[00:04.420]When you said it was over, you shot right through my heart
[00:09.890]Why you let these hoes tear what we had right apart
[00:13.950]Ooh, I was so mad, I should've seen this coming right from the start
[00:19.210]You should beware, beware, beware of a woman with a broken heart
[00:24.300]
[00:25.020][Verse 1: Big Sean]
[00:25.660]Praying to a sky all black
[00:27.330]Looking at the stars like they finna talk back
[00:29.800]Looking at my phone like she finna call back
[00:32.130]But last night I feel like probably ended all that
[00:34.460]Cause by now she woulda sent a text in all caps
[00:37.190]Then another one tryna take it all back
[00:39.260]Saying fuck you, I miss you or I hate you so much
[00:41.720]Cause girls only say "hate you" to the guys that they love
[00:44.350]I know, I know, I know
[00:45.810]The highs, the lows it comes and goes
[00:46.910]You say "be real" I try, I don't
[00:49.550]Cause you take anything and just make it everything
[00:52.170]Kept my phone on silent ever since you got a ring (Funny, right?)
[00:55.180]And I never cheated (I mean, maybe once, twice)
[00:57.540]One time don't change everything
[00:59.360]She ask why I don't feel the same, I'm still the same
[01:02.130]She's still insane and now she's saying
[01:03.510]

[01:51.090]And you heard bitches screaming 'til my phone dies
[01:53.710]Then she text me like "Why you still talk to my mama?"

[01:58.310]Why you make me get this tattoo?
[01:59.990]Man, fuck this tattoo you the reason I wasn't single in college

[02:12.180]
